meanings.definition: Decorated by sewing pieces of fabric onto a larger piece of fabric.
meanings.sent1: The appliqued pillow looked beautiful on the couch.
meanings.sent2: She wore an appliqued dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The appliqued curtains added a pop of color to the room.
meanings.sent4: The appliqued design on the quilt was like a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The appliqued flowers on the tablecloth were so intricate.

meanings.definition: The act of sewing pieces of fabric onto a larger piece of fabric.
meanings.sent1: Her hobby was creating colorful appliqued designs.
meanings.sent2: The appliqued on the jacket was expertly done.
meanings.sent3: He learned about the history of appliqued in his sewing class.
meanings.sent5: The appliqued on the banner caught everyone's attention.
